Heroes_Villains.graphics

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heroes_Villains.graphics.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the frames show for animated objects.

        public Animation(java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] images,

        Constructs an animation object.
